title: Vishnu
blurb: Orchestrator for multi-pipeline workflows: schedule, fan-out/fan-in, retry trees, and resource-aware routing.
description: Vishnu is a DAG-oriented orchestrator for coordinated media/data workflows. Define pipelines declaratively, attach resource policies and SLAs, and dispatch to runners (e.g., Vikram) or HTTP/Container tasks. Vishnu handles retries with jitter, backpressure, idempotency, and emits NDJSON events for live dashboards in Vishal. Audit-friendly with signed manifests and change history.

versions.notes: Fan-in/fan-out primitives, resource tags, NDJSON events.
Retry trees, dead-letter queue, webhook triggers.
Initial DAG engine and executor adapters.
